name: Tomatoes With Basil Sauce
keywords: basil, ricotta, tomato, raw, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch basil to yield 1 cup tightly packed basil leaves
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the basil, and measure one cup. Place the basil, the ricotta, the feta and the salt and pepper in a food processor, and process to make a sauce.
Wash, trim and thickly slice the tomatoes, and arrange the slices on three salad plates, topping each slice with basil sauce.
